titles.title: Iran Sanctions Relief Review Act of 2025
Iran Sanctions Relief Review Act of 2025
To provide for congressional review of actions to terminate or waive sanctions imposed with respect to Iran.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, the Judiciary, Ways and Means, Oversight and Government Reform, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
